downloadTitle: Skype for Business client awareness and readiness resources
downloadDescription: Awareness and readiness resources for the Skype for Business client
detailsSection: This download provides awareness and readiness resources to help organizations make a smooth transition to the new Skype for Business client. The download provides the following resources: Email Announcement and Countdown templates for communicating changes to an organization; Email Tips and Tricks templates; Videos to introduce the new Skype for Business client; How to videos for the new Skype for Business client; A customizable poster and handout to help evangelize how to run more effective meetings.
systemRequirementsSection: This download works with the following Office applications: Microsoft Office 2007 and later.
installInstructionSection: To install this download, save the file to a directory on your computer. After you save the file, right-click it, and then extract the the files to a folder.
